itunes:title: Episode 985 - Special Guest VetTV
title: Episode 985 - Special Guest VetTV
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: VET Tv founder Donny O'Malley and VET Tv documentarian Nick Betts join the show to talk about their new (and serious) documentary "Let's Talk About the War" in which Iraq and Afghanistan combat veterans discuss just how brutal deployment was, both in gen...
itunes:summary:
VET Tv founder Donny O'Malley and VET Tv documentarian Nick Betts join the show to talk about their new (and serious) documentary "Let's Talk About the War" in which Iraq and Afghanistan combat veterans discuss just how brutal deployment was, both in general and on them. Plus Donny talks about what's next for VET Tv's comedies.
